answers.a: the projected portion beyond the gum
answers.c: in the sockets of the maxilla

question: 2.Which one is the bone of facial part?

answers.a: in the lower part of the septum of the nose
answers.b: in the upper part of the septum of the nose
answers.c: in the right side of the septum of the nose
answers.d: near the front part of the medial orbital walls.
